title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API—use in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain for private Q&A.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside your editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama with token-level streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and Nginx.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama completions via REST with API-key auth.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using any Ollama model in threads.

title: ollama-qt-client
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop client for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama (used internally by CLI).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing local LLM power to Discord servers via Ollama.
